item.description:
Football season has begun and Coach Kevin better known as SupahFans is hosting his first store party since the Spring. Call it a Back-to-School party, a Fall Cleaning party or simply an excuse to celebrate New England life style. The store is located at 470 Commonwealth Avenue in Kenmore Square and the event takes place during and after the Red Sox - Blue Jays game starting at 7pm.

Coach Kevin has set the Itinerary, here is what to expect:

Charity Wine Tasting (Beckett's Chardonkay and Ellsbury's Zinfandellsbury)

Seasonal SupahModel Search and Photoshoot for recent design (men and women needed)

Discounts on selected Baseball Shirts for Red Sox Natives

Shirt Swap - Bring your gently worn, unwanted Boston sports apparel and swap for a Supahfan mascot shirt (one per customer).

More information at or E Mail Kevin on the Red Sox Natives site or call the store at 866-787-2432.

More details to follow from Kevin!
item.name: SupahFans Store Opening Day Football Party this Friday
